jrmds.model

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrmds.model.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Group, SubComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a container class for groups, constraints, concepts and templates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<Component> dependsOn
      A Set of Components on which the current Component depends on.
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> externalRepos
      The external Repositories for groups
      private java.lang.String groupSeverityOverwrite
      this is a hack, to ensure customer satisfaction
      private java.lang.Long id
      The Id of the Component for the GraphDatabase.
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> optseverity
      An optional Severity for groups
      private java.lang.String refID
      The Id of the Component, to identify it in other methods.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> Tags
      The Tags are keywords for the Component, used in search or sorting methods:
      private ComponentType type
      This is the type of the Component.

      • id

        The Id of the Component for the GraphDatabase.

      • refID

        The Id of the Component, to identify it in other methods.

      • Tags

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> Tags
        The Tags are keywords for the Component, used in search or sorting methods:

      • type

        private ComponentType type
        This is the type of the Component. It can be: Group, Constraint, Template, Concept.

        A Set of Components on which the current Component depends on.

        Parameters:

      • getRefID

        public java.lang.String getRefID()
        Gets the current refID of the Component object.
        Returns:
        refID or "" if the current refID is null.

      • setRefID

        public void setRefID(java.lang.String refID)
        Sets the current refID with the given refID of the Component object.
        Parameters:
        refID - The refID which is used to overwrite the current refID of the Component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given refID is null.

        Gets the current type of the Component object.
        Returns:
        type

      • setType

        public void setType(ComponentType type)
        Sets the current type with the given type of the Component object.
        Parameters:
        type - The type which is used to overwrite the current type of the Component object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given type is null.

      • getTags

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTags()
        Gets the current Tags of the Component object.
        Returns:
        Tags or new ArrayList if the current Tags is null.

      • addTag

        public void addTag(java.lang.String Tag)
        Adds a given Tag to the current Tags of the Component object.
        Parameters:
        Tag - The given Tag which is to be added to the ArrayList of Tags.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Tag is null.

      • setTags

        public void setTags(java.util.List<java.lang.String> Tags)
        Sets the current Tags of the Component object.
        Parameters:
        Tags - The list of Tags which is to be used to overwrite the current list of Tags.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Tags is null.

      • deleteTag

        public void deleteTag(java.lang.String Tag)
        Deletes one Tag in the current ArrayList Tags if the Component object.
        Parameters:
        Tag - The Tag which is to be deleted in the current Tags.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Tag is null.

      • addReference

        public void addReference(Component cmpt)
        Adds a Reference to another Component object to the current Component object. The other Component is added to the Set dependsOn.
        Parameters:
        cmpt - The Component object which is to be added to the current Set dependsOn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the Component cmpt is null.
        org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException - if the Component cmpt already exists in the Set dependsOn.

      • getReferencedComponents

        public java.util.Set<Component> getReferencedComponents()
        Gets the current Set of Components dependsOn.
        Returns:
        dependsOn

      • deleteReference

        public void deleteReference(Component cmpt)
        Deletes a Component object of the current Set dependsOn.
        Parameters:
        cmpt - The Component which is to be deleted in the current Set dependsOn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the Component cmpt is null.

      • copy

        public void copy(Component cmpt)
        Copies the values of the Component cmpt into the current Component object.
        Parameters:
        cmpt - The Component object which is to be copied.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if Component cmpt is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type of cmpt doesn't match the type of the current Component.

      • addExternalRepo

        public void addExternalRepo(java.lang.String extRepo)
        Adds an External Repository to the Component.
        Parameters:
        extRepo - external Repository which is to be added.

      • setExternalRepo

        public void setExternalRepo(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> extRepos)
        Adds a Set of external Repositories in the Component.
        Parameters:
        extRepos -
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the extRepos is null.

      • deleteExternalRepo

        public boolean deleteExternalRepo(java.lang.String extRepo)
        Deletes an external Repository out of the Component.
        Parameters:
        extRepo - The external Repository which is to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if removed, false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the extRepos is null.
